name: Send an email when a campaign in Google Ads is close to hitting its budget
description:
Please disable your ad blockers when working with our Google Ads apps. The ad blockers may cause unexpected behavior.

This template regularly checks spend of your Google Ads campaigns for yesterday and compares the spend with campaigns' budget. If the spend/budget is above a set threshold, an email notification will be sent.

The template is scheduled to run every day at 9 AM. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking the clock icon on the first module.
